summary: A German girl travels to Israel to help people with disabilities, where she learns a lot about the role of her grandparents in WWII and meets a man who wants to move to Berlin.
cast: Karoline Schuch|Doron Amit|Leah Koenig|Max Mauff|Lore Richter|Sigalit Fuchs|Trystan Pütter|Suzanne von Borsody|Danielle Shimshoni|Tsahi Hanan|Lior Shabtai|Alon Zinger|Benzion Reuven|Shoshana Garbati|Simona Idan|Ori Yaniv|Eli Ashkenazi|Hanna Rieber|Rudi Barta|Ruth Geller|Ilan Avigal|Hagit Ben Ami|Brigitte Böttrich|Andreas Borcherding|Agnes Kiyomi Decker|Claudia-Sofie Jelinek|Martin Ontrop|Tom Idelson|Gaya Garyani
title: Hannas Reise
